com.github.moribund.net

Class NetworkBootstrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.net.NetworkBootstrapper

  • public class NetworkBootstrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    The NetworkBootstrapper class is responsible for giving the initial instructions to start the networking process and listeners.

    • Field Summary

      NetworkBootstrapper()

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Connects to the Server using our Client. This method registers the packets before starting the Connection.

      • registerPackets

        private void registerPackets(com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Kryo kryo)
        Registers packets that are serialized by Kryo. Packets are NOT required to implement Kryo or KryoSerializable.
        Parameters:
        kryo - The Client's Kryo.

      • createPacketDispatcher

        public PacketDispatcher createPacketDispatcher()
        Creates a new PacketDispatcher with the client.
        Returns:
        The newly made packet dispatcher.
